name: RIBOT VI
description:
RIBOT VI is the last of his kind. He was created to help bring peace and love from the brotherhood of Disciples of the past. Due to the over population of the Blue Belly Sewer Ratz and their infectious spells of turmoil that brings pain to the righteous, RIBOT VI is now the only left that can defeat the Blue Belly Sewer Ratz and bring peace and love to a dying nation!!

RIBOT VI must destroy all of the Blue Belly Sewer Ratz that he can while avoiding the spike traps, spike bombs, and road blocks. The Six Star holds the power to conquer over his enemies and their traps.

Can you help RIBOT VI succeed on his quest to overcome the hideous acts of the Blue Belly Sewer Rats?
